lines.text: If you'd let me have that blood, I could set up a Face of Death ritual...
But you're not gonna let me do that, because blah blah blah summoning demons is bad.
Even though I'm a total expert at it and wouldn't mess up.
Now hold on- what's that Face of Death thing?
Just shows you the face of the last person nearby who held murderous intent, is all.
Would be super useful for investigating crimes if you weren't all giant babies!
Kid, even if I okayed that, it wouldn't narrow anythin' down.
If more than one of 'em had murderous intent, it wouldn't tell us which one actually shot.
